title: (pan) Super House For Immediate Sale
details:
We have a super house for sale 250 meters from the Main Pelawatte junction
Built on 08 perches land
living space 3000 + 1300 roof top
down stairs - 2 bedrooms/1 bathroom/hall dining / open pantry with cupboards/wet kitchen / servants room and bathroom/parking for 2 vehicles with roller shutter gate
upstairs - 2 bedrooms / 1 bathroom/laundry room / Tv lounge/balcony
roof top

excellent location and very quiet.

fully tilled and new paint .

Rs 39 million - negotiable
all deeds and other documents in hand and clear
